mapper.select: SELECT seq, firstName, lastName, gender, btd, email, passWord, price, score, delNy, admSignin, mobileCarrier FROM userUi WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT a.seq, a.email, a.passWord FROM userUi a WHERE 1=1 AND a.email = #{email} AND a.passWord = #{passWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO codeGroup ( seq, firstName, lastName, gender, btd, email, passWord, price, score, delNy, mobileCarrier ) values ( #{seq}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{gender}, #{btd}, #{email}, #{passWord}, #{price}, #{score}, #{delNy}, #{mobileCarrier} )
mapper.update: UPDATE userUi SET firstName = #{firstName}, lastName = #{lastName}, gender = #{gender}, btd = #{btd}, email = #{email}, passWord = #{passWord}, price = #{price}, score = #{score}, delNy = #{delNy}, mobileCarrier = #{mobileCarrier} WHERE seq = #{seq}
